abstract: The company said it was in talks with the Texas-based private equity fund Lone Star to buy a majority stake in the Korea Exchange Bank.
snippet: The company said it was in talks with the Texas-based private equity fund Lone Star to buy a majority stake in the Korea Exchange Bank.
lead_paragraph: SEOUL, South Korea, Aug. 20  HSBC Holdings said Monday that it was in talks with a Texas-based private equity fund, Lone Star Funds, to buy a majority stake in Korea Exchange Bank, which would give HSBC a long-sought retail banking network in one of Asia’s largest economies.

headline.main: HSBC in Talks to Acquire a Big Stake in Korean Bank
headline.print_headline: HSBC in Talks to Acquire Big Stake in a Korean Bank
